##  install the prename command and accomplish rename file easiy

```
prename -v 's/.txt/.log/' *.txt

#file10.txt -> file10.log
#file1.txt -> file1.log
#file2.txt -> file2.log
#file3.txt -> file3.log
#file4.txt -> file4.log


```
